import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Table, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap'; const FeesRules = () => { const feeStructure = [ { class: "Nursery - UKG", tuition: "â‚¹2,500", transport: "â‚¹1,500", total: "â‚¹4,000" }, { class: "Class I - V", tuition: "â‚¹3,500", transport: "â‚¹1,500", total: "â‚¹5,000" }, { class: "Class VI - VIII", tuition: "â‚¹4,500", transport: "â‚¹1,500", total: "â‚¹6,000" }, { class: "Class IX - X", tuition: "â‚¹5,500", transport: "â‚¹1,500", total: "â‚¹7,000" }, { class: "Class XI - XII", tuition: "â‚¹6,500", transport: "â‚¹1,500", total: "â‚¹8,000" } ]; const additionalFees = [ { item: "Admission Fee", amount: "â‚¹5,000", frequency: "One-time" }, { item: "Development Fee", amount: "â‚¹10,000", frequency: "One-time" }, { item: "Security Deposit", amount: "â‚¹5,000", frequency: "Refundable" }, { item: "Library Fee", amount: "â‚¹2,000", frequency: "Annual" }, { item: "Laboratory Fee", amount: "â‚¹3,000", frequency: "Annual" }, { item: "Examination Fee", amount: "â‚¹3,000", frequency: "Annual" }, { item: "Sports Fee", amount: "â‚¹2,000", frequency: "Annual" }, { item: "Computer Fee", amount: "â‚¹2,500", frequency: "Annual" } ]; const paymentRules = [ "Fees must be paid by the 10th of every month", "Late payment charges of â‚¹50 per day will be applied after due date", "Payment can be made through cash, cheque, or online transfer", "Cheques should be drawn in favor of 'Genesis School'", "Online payment details will be provided separately", "Receipt must be obtained for all payments", "Fee structure is subject to revision with prior notice", "No fees will be refunded after the academic year begins" ]; return (

Fees Rules

{/* Payment Rules */}

Payment Rules

 {paymentRules.map((rule, index) => ( ðŸ’° {rule} ))}

Payment Methods
  • Cash payment at school office
  • Cheque payment (payable to Genesis School)
  • Online bank transfer
  • UPI payment (PhonePe, Google Pay, Paytm)
  • Credit/Debit card payment
  • Monthly auto-debit facility available
  • Annual payment discount (5% off)
  • Sibling discount (10% for second child)
 {/* Fee Concession */}

Fee Concession & Scholarships
Merit-Based Scholarships
  • Academic Excellence: 25% fee waiver
  • Sports Achievement: 20% fee waiver
  • Cultural Activities: 15% fee waiver
  • Community Service: 10% fee waiver
Need-Based Concessions
  • Economic hardship: Up to 50% concession
  • Single parent: 25% concession
  • Armed forces personnel: 20% concession
  • Government employees: 15% concession
Application Process

Submit application with supporting documents to the Principal's office. Applications are reviewed monthly and decisions are communicated within 15 days.

{/* Contact Information */}

Fee Inquiries
